desc: Jeremy is not incredibly tall, but the 8th domino would be 6ft tall, the same height as Jeremy.
name: Jeremy

desc: A regulation basketball hoop stands 10 feet off the ground.  So would the 9th domino!
name: Basketball Hoop

desc: Normal two-story houses are about 20 feet high, just a little higher than domino number 10.
name: Two-Story House

desc: Semi-trailers come in many different lengths.  The shortest type is about 28 feet long, that is how tall domino 11 would be.
name: Semi-Trailer

desc: On March 20, 2002 McKay Dee opened a new hospital, the first baby was born at the new hospital at 11:59 a.m. The new hospital's doctor office wing stands around 50 feet, just a few feet higher than the 12th domino.
name: McKay-Dee Hospital

desc: The Market Start Building in down-town Ogden certainly isn't the tallest building in Ogden, but it is still tall.  It stands at 76 feet tall, which is just a bit shorter than domino 13.
name: Market Star Building

desc: The Boeing 737 is the best-selling jet in the world.  It has multiple models that hold up to 215 people.  One model is 130 feet long, almost exactly the height of the 14th domino
name: Boeing 737

desc: The location for the Salt Lake Temple was marked by President Young on July 28, 1847; only 4 days after they arrived.  Construction officially began on April 6, 1853.  After 40 years the temple was dedicated on April 6, 1893; exactly 40 years after construction began.  For years it was the tallest building in Utah and stands at 210 feet, which is just shorter than the 15th domino.
name: Salt Lake Temple

desc: The Coastal Redwood or Sequoia sempervirens is the largest tree in the world.  They grow only in the US in Northern California and Southern Oregon.  They are giants!  They can grow up to 379 feet and have trunks that are 30 feet in diameter.  Domino 16 would be just a little smaller than these giants.
name: Coastal Redwood

desc: The Space Needle was built in 1962 for the 1962 World Fair and is the tallest building west of the Mississippi.  It stands at 605 feet tall, the 17th domino would be just a hair bigger than this restuarant in the sky
name: Seattle Space Needle

desc: Currently the largest warship in the world, these carriers hold almost 100 fighter jets, over 5,000 people and only have to refuel once every 20 years.  They are 1,092 feet long, which is about the height of domino number 18.
name: Nimitz-Class Aircraft Carrier

desc: Opening in New York City in 2014, the One World Trade Center is the tallest building in the USA, and 4th tallest in the world.  It stands at 1,776 feet, over 300 feet taller than the Empire State Building.  The 19th domino would taller than this building without its spire!
name: One World Trade Center

desc: Located in Dubai, Burj Khalifa is the tallest building in the world.  It stands at a whooping 2,722 feet high, 700 feet taller than any other building.  Crazy thing is that the 20th domino would be 100 feet taller than this enormous building.
name: Burj Khalifa

desc: The deepest canyon on planet Earth is the Grand Canyon in Arizona, USA., its depth greatly varies and is deeper than a mile in some places.  The average depth of this canyon is about 4,500 feet, and domino 21 would stick out of the top of the canyon!
name: Grand Canyon

desc: Eagles can fly really high, some claim to have seen them fly as high as airplanes.  However, the highest they are usually spotted is around 8,000 feet.  Domino 22 would be a great spot for a soaring eagle to perch.
name: Soaring Eagle

desc: Located in the Uinta Mountain range in northeastern Utah, Kings Peak is the highest point in the state.  It stands 13,528 feet above sea-level, the 23rd domino would be able the same height.
name: Kings Peak

desc: Mount Everest is the highest point on planet Earth, it rises 29,029 feet above sea-level.  The first successful summit was made on May 29, 1953 by Edmund Hillary of New Zealand and Tenzing Norgay of Nepal.  Domino 24 would not be quite as tall as Everest but it would be really close.
name: Mount Everest

desc: The lowest place on Earth is a deep sea canyon in the Pacific ocean near the Philippines.  The Mariana Trench is about 36,000 feet below sea-level at its deepest, and is full of very interest life.  The 25th domino would stick out of the ocean if you rested it at the bottom of this trench.
name: Mariana Trench

desc: The Earth's atmosphere is a collection of gases that 'stick' to earth because of its gravity.  It is almost impossible to determine where it ends, it just gets thinner and thinner.  However the majority of the atmosphere is within 53,000 feet of the planet's surface.  So domino 26 would kind of be in outer space.
name: Earth's Atmosphere (sort of)

desc: The largest mountain in the solar system is Olympus Mons located on Mars.  Its base is as wide as the country France and it stands 88,600 feet tall, or about 16 miles.  The 28th domino would be much taller than the highest point in the solar system!
name: Olympus Mons
